title: What is the hierarchy of musical instruments among musicians? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, I’m not trying to diss the other guy who commented, but being a conductor isn’t playing an instrument lol. There’s really no relevant hierarchy. I’d say in orchestra, first violins have the most parts, and then it’s the cellos, violas, and so on. I’ll make a list.. Orchestra first violinscellossecond violinsviolasbassesAnd if there’s a harp or piano or percussion, then they’d probably be before the basses. I’m only basing this on the amount of melodic lines the sections get to have. Basses almost never have the melody. I can’t really answer for band instruments because I’m not part of band. However, triangles and xylophones probably are lower on the hierarchy.
